changeSet.author: mabi
changeSet.sql: update JOB_ADVERTISEMENT set DISPLAY_COMPANY_NAME = COMPANY_NAME, DISPLAY_COMPANY_STREET = COMPANY_STREET, DISPLAY_COMPANY_HOUSE_NUMBER = COMPANY_HOUSE_NUMBER, DISPLAY_COMPANY_POSTAL_CODE = COMPANY_POSTAL_CODE, DISPLAY_COMPANY_CITY = COMPANY_CITY, DISPLAY_COMPANY_COUNTRY_ISO_CODE = COMPANY_COUNTRY_ISO_CODE, DISPLAY_COMPANY_POST_OFFICE_BOX_NUMBER = COMPANY_POST_OFFICE_BOX_NUMBER, DISPLAY_COMPANY_POST_OFFICE_BOX_POSTAL_CODE = COMPANY_POST_OFFICE_BOX_POSTAL_CODE, DISPLAY_COMPANY_POST_OFFICE_BOX_CITY = COMPANY_POST_OFFICE_BOX_CITY, DISPLAY_COMPANY_EMAIL = COMPANY_EMAIL, DISPLAY_COMPANY_PHONE = COMPANY_PHONE, DISPLAY_COMPANY_WEBSITE = COMPANY_WEBSITE, DISPLAY_COMPANY_SURROGATE = COMPANY_SURROGATE
